ewani waradiwalata shasanika washayen gathayuthu kriyamarga winayehi dakwa thibe.bauddha daru dariyan saha wisheshayenma tharuna daruwange hadiyawa, sanwaraya saha pawathma kereda awadhanaya wisheshayen yomu kala yuthu kalaya elambaa thibe.
alla asabada pihiti rathagala samipaye sancharaka katayuthu amathyanshaya wisin sawikala puwaruwak magin makeli allata sambandha ithihasaya ganath yamak igenagannata apata hakiwuna.
